channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Mike Johnson hit with new Republican dissent over shutdown strategy in private call
item.description: Republican dissent over House Speaker Mike Johnson's (R-La.) shutdown strategy spilled out on a private GOP call this afternoon, with Rep. Dan Crensha...

item.title: "Catastrophic" Hurricane Melissa makes landfall in Jamaica
item.description: Hurricane Melissa made landfall in Jamaica as a Category 5 storm on Tuesday — bringing an "EXTREMELY DANGEROUS AND LIFE-THREATENING SITUATION," per th...

item.title: The shutdown's pain is spreading, from child care to heating bills
item.description: Federal funding to programs that millions rely on, from early education to food and utility bill aid have shut down, leaving families scrambling for h...

item.title: AG Pam Bondi reviewing Biden pardons signed by autopen
item.description: Attorney General Pam Bondi said her office is reviewing former President Biden 's use of an autopen for pardons after a House Oversight report questio...

item.title: Scoop: GOP senator pushes Vance for help on Trump
item.description: Sen. John Kennedy (R-La.) urged Vice President Vance during a closed-door lunch Tuesday to get President Trump to stop demanding that the Senate do aw...

item.title: Mike Johnson says he doesn’t see a ‘path’ to a third Trump term
item.description: Trump, 79, has for months openly mused about a third term, even though it would be prohibited by the Constitution.

item.title: Citing autopen use, GOP-led House Oversight Committee calls Biden actions ‘illegitimate’
item.description: Democrats on the committee said the GOP’s conclusions about Biden were the result of a “sham investigation.”

item.title: World leaders wooing Trump turn to a common present: golf clubs
item.description: Everywhere the U.S. president goes, it seems, dignitaries have decided that the way to his heart is through the game he loves.

item.title: Biden adviser says he would have received $4 million bonus for 2024 win
item.description: Mike Donilon’s total potential pay package was unusually large and outsized compared to the salaries of senior campaign officials working for the pres...

item.title: A democratic socialist is poised to become New York mayor. Democrats are nervous.
item.description: The party is divided over how much Zohran Mamdani’s rise will matter in 2026 midterm elections that they expect to be dominated by opposition to Trump...

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
